## Conditions.Condition.toValueOrChildConditionDecl() method

Gets the value for this condition, or the [child condition declaration](./ts-res.resourcejson.json.ichildconditiondecl.md) if the condition has non-default operator, priority or a score as default.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toValueOrChildConditionDecl(): string | ResourceJson.Json.IChildConditionDecl;
```
**Returns:**

string \| [ResourceJson.Json.IChildConditionDecl](./ts-res.resourcejson.json.ichildconditiondecl.md)

A string value for this condition, or the [child condition declaration](./ts-res.resourcejson.json.ichildconditiondecl.md) if the condition has non-default operator, priority or a score as default.
